title: The Castle's Sigh
story: The very foundations of the castle seem to groan and shift beneath your feet. Distant whispers echo up and down the stairwells, attempting to ensnare weary minds.
effect: During this Night phase, each staircase step now costs 3 movement steps instead of 2. Additionally, any hero who ends their turn on a Stairwell room (Catacombs, First-Floor, Second-Floor, or Third-Floor Stairwell) must roll a D6: on a 1-2, they lose 1 Sanity; on a 3-4, they lose 1 Willpower.
